chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O LORD.
items.plainText: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O LORD.

items.text: Lord, hear my voice: let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.
items.plainText: Lord, hear my voice: let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.

items.text: If thou, LORD, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand?
items.plainText: If thou, LORD, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand?

items.text: But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.
items.plainText: But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.

items.text: I wait for the LORD, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope.
items.plainText: I wait for the LORD, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope.

items.text: My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.
items.plainText: My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.

items.text: Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
items.plainText: Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.

items.text: And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
items.plainText: And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
